info.name: Literature Review System API - Complete
info.description:
Complete API collection with all 52 endpoints for the AI-Powered Literature Review System.

**Features:**
- User authentication (10 endpoints)
- Research project management (7 endpoints)
- Paper analysis with LLM (7 endpoints)
- Background jobs (3 endpoints)
- LLM Pipeline (3 endpoints)
- LLM Usage tracking (6 endpoints)
- Credits management (1 endpoint)
- Admin - Model Pricing (4 endpoints)
- Admin - System Config (5 endpoints)
- Admin - Credits (5 endpoints)
- Health check (1 endpoint)

**Base URL:** {{baseUrl}}/v1
**Total Endpoints:** 52

body.raw:

  "keywords_seed": ["LLM", "literature review"],
  "projectId": "{{projectId}}"
}
